featured.text: It was in the 19th century that the magician Robert Houdin came along and changed people’s views and attitudes about magic.
When we change our attitudes toward ourselves, the whole world changes.
In a job interview, attitude and personality are usually important _____ that influence the decision of the interviewers.
Rap's rise and sustained global popularity is a good illustration of how influential youth culture is on youth attitudes and behavior.
The overall tone (attitude) of this passage is _________.

other.text: Which of the following best describes the author’s attitude toward medical tests?
Which of the following best describes the author’s attitude toward the future of desalination? (A) Amazed.
What is the speaker’s attitude toward the blood-type belief in Japan? (A) Negative.
What is the author’s attitude toward Capoeira as a sport? (A) Admiring.

definition.zh_def: 態度；對某事物的看法或感受。
definition.en_def: A settled way of thinking or feeling about something.
definition.example: Her positive attitude helped the team stay motivated.
